entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then cloudy. Showers beginning overnight. Fog spreading inland this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 11. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
